LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_AssaultHelmet.label: HAP helmet
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_AssaultHelmet.description: A heavy helmet designed to protect wearer from bullets and shrapnel during direct assault operations./n/nAlso provides toxic gas and vacuum exposure resistances, along with increased shooting accuracy.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_ProcessorHelmet.label: HAP processor helmet
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_ProcessorHelmet.descriptio: An advanced helmet with built-in processor core, that allows to use more neuroimplants and control more mechs./n/nAlso provides toxic gas and vacuum exposure resistances, along with increased shooting accuracy.
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_ShieldHelmet.label: HAPS helmet
LanguageData.DMSRC_Apparel_ShieldHelmet.description: A heavy helmet designed to protect wearer from bullets and shrapnel during direct assault operations. Built-in shield bubble projector covers wearer from incoming projectiles./n/nAlso provides toxic gas and vacuum exposure resistances, along with increased shooting accuracy.
